p: On day 3, the pandaâ€™s conditions and appetite improved. Nasal discharge was unchanged, but he only coughed occasionally. Rectal temperature was normal. Blood examination revealed leukocytosis with marked neutrophilia and lymphopenia, hypoferremia, and increased fibrinogen and globulins. He gradually improved in the next 5 days and has remained asymptomatic for 9 months after the onset of illness.
